5:[["$","$L19",null,{"mdxPath":["embed","iframe-api","iframe-player-factory"]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"x:mx-auto x:flex x:max-w-(--nextra-content-width)","children":["$","$L1a",null,{"value":[{"value":"Методы","id":"методы","depth":3},{"value":"Рекомендации","id":"рекомендации","depth":3}],"children":[["$","$L1b",null,{}],["$","$L1c",null,{"metadata":{"title":"Создание плеера","filePath":"src/content/embed/iframe-api/iframe-player-factory.md"},"bottomContent":"$undefined","children":[["$","div",null,{"id":"nextra-skip-nav"}],["$","main",null,{"data-pagefind-body":true,"children":[["$","h1",null,{"id":"$undefined","className":"x:tracking-tight x:text-slate-900 x:dark:text-slate-100 x:font-bold x:mt-2 x:text-4xl","children":["Создание плеера","$undefined"]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"x:not-first:mt-6 x:leading-7","children":"Для создания плеера используется объект (фабрика) со следующими свойствами и методами:"}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"id":"методы","className":"x:tracking-tight x:text-slate-900 x:dark:text-slate-100 x:font-semibold x:target:animate-[fade-in_1.5s] x:mt-8 x:text-2xl","children":["Методы",["$","$L1d",null,{"id":"методы"}]]}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"className":"x:[:is(ol,ul)_&]:my-3 x:not-first:mt-6 x:list-disc x:ms-6","children":["\n",["$","li",null,{"className":"x:my-2","children":["\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"x:not-first:mt-6 x:leading-7","children":[["$","strong",null,{"children":["$","code",null,{"className":"nextra-code","dir":"ltr","children":"create(elementId: string, options: CreateOptions): Promise<IframePlayerApi>"}]}]," ",["$","$L15",null,{"href":"","className":"x:focus-visible:nextra-focus x:text-primary-600 x:underline x:hover:no-underline x:decoration-from-font x:[text-underline-position:from-font]","name":"create"}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"x:not-first:mt-6 x:leading-7","children":["Создать плеер. Если элемент с id ",["$","code",null,{"className":"nextra-code","dir":"ltr","children":"elementId"}]," не является ",["$","code",null,{"className":"nextra-code","dir":"ltr","children":"<iframe>"}],", то этот элемент будет заменен на элемент ",["$","code",null,{"className":"nextra-code","dir":"ltr","children":"<iframe>"}],", иначе будет использован указанный элемент ",["$","code",null,{"className":"nextra-code","dir":"ltr","children":"<iframe>"}]," для встраивания плеера. Вторым аргументом передается объект с ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#CreateOptions","className":"x:focus-visible:nextra-focus x:text-primary-600 x:underline x:hover:no-underline x:decoration-from-font x:[text-underline-position:from-font]","children":"параметрами плеера"}],". Возвращается ",["$","code",null,{"className":"nextra-code","dir":"ltr","children":"Promise"}]," с плеером (",["$","$L15",null,{"href":"/embed/iframe-api/iframe-player-api","className":"x:focus-visible:nextra-focus x:text-primary-600 x:underline x:hover:no-underline x:decoration-from-font x:[text-underline-position:from-font]","children":"объект управления плеером"}],").\nЕсли плеер с указанным id уже существует, то вернется экземпляр уже существующего плеера."]}],"\n",["$","blockquote",null,{"className":"x:not-first:mt-6 x:border-gray-300 x:italic x:text-gray-700 x:dark:border-gray-700 x:dark:text-gray-400 x:border-s-2 x:ps-6","children":["\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"x:not-first:mt-6 x:leading-7","children":["После создания плеера нельзя самостоятельно удалять элемент с id ",["$","code",null,{"className":"nextra-code","dir":"ltr","children":"elementId"}]," или изменять url ",["$","code",null,{"className":"nextra-code","dir":"ltr","children":"<iframe>"}],". Для удаления плеера используйте метод ",["$","$L15",null,{"href":"/embed/iframe-api/iframe-player-api","className":"x:focus-visible:nextra-focus x:text-primary-600 x:underline x:hover:no-underline x:decoration-from-font x:[text-underline-position:from-font]","children":["$","code",null,{"className":"nextra-code","dir":"ltr","children":"destroy"}]}],"."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"x:not-first:mt-6 x:leading-7","children":["При пересоздании плеера необходимо дождаться завершения выполнения метода ",["$","$L15",null,{"href":"/embed/iframe-api/iframe-player-api","className":"x:focus-visible:nextra-focus x:text-primary-600 x:underline x:hover:no-underline x:decoration-from-font x:[text-underline-position:from-font]","children":["$","code",null,{"className":"nextra-code","dir":"ltr","children":"destroy"}]}]," (элемент с id По умолчанию `true`. */"}]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#E36209","--shiki-dark":"#FFAB70"},"children":"    playsInline"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"?:"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#005CC5","--shiki-dark":"#79B8FF"},"children":" boolean"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":";"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6A737D","--shiki-dark":"#6A737D"},"children":"    /** Зацикленное видео. */"}]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#E36209","--shiki-dark":"#FFAB70"},"children":"    loop"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"?:"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#005CC5","--shiki-dark":"#79B8FF"},"children":" boolean"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":";"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6A737D","--shiki-dark":"#6A737D"},"children":"    /**"}]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6A737D","--shiki-dark":"#6A737D"},"children":"     * Автоматический запуск плеера."}]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6A737D","--shiki-dark":"#6A737D"},"children":"     * Если не удалось начать воспроизведение со звуком, то плеер попытается начать воспроизведение с выключенным звуком."}]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6A737D","--shiki-dark":"#6A737D"},"children":"     *"}]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6A737D","--shiki-dark":"#6A737D"},"children":"     * `viewable` - автоматический запуск при появлении плеера в области видимости на странице."}]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6A737D","--shiki-dark":"#6A737D"},"children":"     * Применимо когда плеер находится внизу страницы и до его появления нужно прокрутить страницу."}]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6A737D","--shiki-dark":"#6A737D"},"children":"     */"}]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#E36209","--shiki-dark":"#FFAB70"},"children":"    autoPlay"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"?:"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#005CC5","--shiki-dark":"#79B8FF"},"children":" boolean"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":" |"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":" 'viewable'"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":";"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6A737D","--shiki-dark":"#6A737D"},"children":"    /** Ставить на паузу (если `true`) или сбрасывать на начальное состояние (если `reset`), если другой плеер на странице начал проигрывание. По умолчанию `true`. */"}]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#E36209","--shiki-dark":"#FFAB70"},"children":"    autoPause"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"?:"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#005CC5","--shiki-dark":"#79B8FF"},"children":" boolean"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":" |"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":" 'reset'"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":";"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6A737D","--shiki-dark":"#6A737D"},"children":"    /**"}]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6A737D","--shiki-dark":"#6A737D"},"children":"     * "}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"@experimental"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6A737D","--shiki-dark":"#6A737D"},"children":"     *"}]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6A737D","--shiki-dark":"#6A737D"},"children":"     * `visible` -
